meanings.definition: A substance found in the inner layer of certain plant cell walls.
meanings.sent1: The endexines provide strength to the plant cell walls.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study endexines to understand plant cell structures better.
meanings.sent3: The endexines in the cell wall decided to have a party.
meanings.sent4: The endexines stood guard like loyal soldiers protecting the plant cell.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the endexines looked like tiny building blocks holding the cell together.

meanings.definition: The innermost layer of a plant cell wall.
meanings.sent1: The endexines form a protective barrier around the plant cell.
meanings.sent2: When examining a plant cell, the endexines are usually visible under high magnification.
meanings.sent3: The endexines in the plant cell wall whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The endexines embraced the cell like a warm hug, keeping it safe.
meanings.sent5: In the diagram, the endexines were depicted as the heart of the plant cell structure.
